jobDescription: Must have 3-4 years of related experience.  Understanding Data Management & BI concepts, Data Analysis, Analytics, Cubes, Reporting Technologies, ETL Technology: SQL Server  SSIS, SSAS and SSRS  Strong SQL / ETL skills Requirements: Demonstrated SQL experience with ETL knowledge will need to collate / pull data from multiple sources to build an enterprise data catalog  Knowledge of Data Quality Concepts ability to curate / harmonize / standardize data sets  Should be able to perform quality checks on defined parameters  Able to interpret/collect business requirements and interact with senior technical stakeholders  Knowledge / Working experience in BI technologies  Conversant with Microsoft BI Stack: Power BI, Sql server, MDX, SSAS  Excellent communication skills Able to communicate with Senior Managers level stakeholders  Able to conduct/drive meetings effectively with minimal supervision  Self-starter with low maintenance Able to get things done.  Background on prior/current work experience on Microsoft ecosystem is highly desired  Knowledge of data management standards & best practices and data quality tools like IDQ is preferred
